Text: Im just a PeaOn but its a shame to let Dynegy have the company for billion dollars Enron is often known and admired for their creative and bright minds Why cant the people buy the company we are going less than a football team I know certainly we are a lot smarter Its awful that were getting calls from the enemy telling us to Get out of their new building You help build this company you have ideas dont just throw it away on one month of bad press If you give up they will say its always better the old way WE ARE ENRON WE HAVE CLASS AND WE DONT LAY DOWN AND DIE WE HAVE A SOLUTION
